select COALESCE(max(template_seq), 1) + 1 as nextSeq from contract_template
insert into contract_template ( template_title , template_seq , template_type , use_yn , memo , created_by , created_at ) select concat(ct.template_title ,'_copy') as template_title , #{nextSeq} , ct.template_type , ct.use_yn , ct.memo , #{createdBy} as created_by , now() as created_at from contract_template ct where ct.template_seq = #{templateSeq}

insert into contract_template_details ( template_seq , contract_title_en , contract_title_hu , contents_en , contents_hu , employer_info_en , employer_info_hu , employee_info_en , employee_info_hu , created_by , created_at ) select #{nextSeq} as template_seq , contract_title_en , contract_title_hu , contents_en , contents_hu , employer_info_en , employer_info_hu , employee_info_en , employee_info_hu , #{createdBy} as created_by , now() as created_at from contract_template_details ctd where ctd.template_seq = #{templateSeq}
